original: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
analyzed: ▁ava ssu tāya ▁bhikkhuniyā ▁a vass ut assa ▁puris apuggal assa ▁kāya saṃ sagg aṃ ▁sādiy anti yā ▁āpattiyo ▁catunnaṃ ▁vi patt īnaṃ ▁kati ▁ vipatti yo ▁bhaj anti

original: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
